title: Why We WANT to See a "Good Faith" Conversation between Jordan Peterson and Ibram X Kendi
description:
When I think of how introducing Jordan B Peterson and Ibram X. Kendi into the same mental space I see sparks. I see two sides that would imagine such conversation would be pointless. But I think the DESIRE for it to NOT be pointless is expressing a very important thing. We WANT there to be hope of a space in which the two could find agreement, and change and a future. We WANT there to be hope. 

Jordan Peterson with Coleman Hughes https://youtu.be/TFhynK0iZNE
Jordan Peterson Munk Debate https://youtu.be/ST6kj9OEYf0
Jordan Peterson Cathy Newman https://youtu.be/aMcjxSThD54
Jordan Peterson Slavoj Zizek https://youtu.be/qsHJ3LvUWTs
Andrew Sullivan Tweet https://twitter.com/sullydish/status/1337060903762731009
Kendi how to be an antiracist https://amzn.to/3mhUkQg
Daniel Bonevac the Problem of Normativity https://youtu.be/spBaumdWlgQ
